snippet.title: Pinball League: Hardhat Zone - PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
NOTE: This was originally released for Windows 8 and Windows Phone, so the touch prompts mean this was made at a time Microsoft had promoted tablets that used a special version of Windows 8, known as Windows 8 RT.

Pinball League: HardHat Zone is a 3D pinball game that allows players to experience this classic game in a whole new way. although the construction theme is not as glamorous as it could be and the sound effects tend to lag behind a little, the graphics are highly polished and really help to draw players into the game. the two player mode also helps to ramp up the fun factor by allowing friends to go head to head to see who has the best skills.

Pinball League: Hardhat Zone (C) TAINICOM LTD
Also released for Windows Phone and Android

#pinball #pinballleague #pinballleaguehardhatzone #hardhatzone #windows8 #windowsphone #tainicom

FUN FACT: While the Windows 8 (as in PC) and Windows Phone versions are no longer available for sale (at least as far as I know), the game is still available to download on the Google Play Store for Android, though unlike the paid Windows 8 version, it does come with in-app purchases.
